name: Sarah Chen
title: Partner
explainability: Led Series A investments in 3 similar B2B SaaS startups in the last 18 months, including DataVault ($12M) and AnalyticsPro ($15M). Strong portfolio overlap in enterprise analytics space.
warmIntro: 2nd degree via John Smith (former CTO at TechCorp)
bio: Sarah is a Partner at Accel with over 8 years of experience investing in B2B software companies. She focuses on enterprise analytics, data infrastructure, and AI-powered platforms.

name: Marcus Rodriguez
title: Managing Director
explainability: Strong portfolio overlap with 5 enterprise software investments. Previously led Series A for DataFlow competitor (similar market size and business model). Known for hands-on support with go-to-market strategy.
bio: Marcus leads enterprise software investments at Kleiner Perkins. He has a strong track record of supporting founders with scaling challenges and building enterprise sales teams.

name: Emily Watson
title: Principal
explainability: Led investments in 7 startups with similar revenue models and business metrics. Particular expertise in go-to-market strategy for B2B platforms. Recently backed two companies in adjacent markets.
bio: Emily is a Principal at Sequoia Capital focusing on B2B software and marketplace companies. She has deep expertise in helping companies scale their go-to-market operations.

name: David Park
title: General Partner
explainability: Previous investments in adjacent markets with strong network in enterprise sales. Recently backed two Series A companies in similar sectors, though at earlier revenue stages.
bio: David is a General Partner at Greylock Partners with expertise in enterprise infrastructure and security companies. He focuses on technical founders building category-defining companies.

name: Lisa Kumar
title: Senior Associate
explainability: Recently promoted to Senior Associate with focus on enterprise software. Strong technical background and experience with data analytics companies. Actively sourcing Series A opportunities.
warmIntro: 2nd degree via Sarah Wilson (Stanford alumni network)
bio: Lisa is a Senior Associate at a16z focusing on enterprise software and developer tools. She has a computer science background and strong technical diligence capabilities.

name: Robert Kim
title: Partner
explainability: Exceptional track record with enterprise analytics companies. Led successful exits at DataCore ($240M) and AnalyticsFirst ($180M). Strong operational support for scaling teams.
bio: Robert is a Partner at Index Ventures with deep expertise in enterprise data and analytics companies. He has a strong track record of successful exits and operational support.
